name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Franklin R. CROMLEY, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
Former Justice HUTCHINSON did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Franklin R. CROMLEY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Former Justice HUTCHINSON did not participate in the decision of this case.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Henry S. Kenderdine, Jr., Dist. Atty., Joseph C. Madenspacher, Lancaster, for appellant.
David F. Wedge, Lancaster, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
534 A.2d 452
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Franklin R. CROMLEY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1986.
Decided Dec. 2, 1987.
Henry S. Kenderdine, Jr., Dist. Atty., Joseph C. Madenspacher, Lancaster, for appellant.
David F. Wedge, Lancaster, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
